```{r dependencies, include=FALSE}
library("ggplot2")
library(cowplot)
library("dplyr")
library("survival")
library("knitr")
library("gridExtra")
library("tidyr")
library("kableExtra")
library("data.table")
options(warn=-1)
opts_chunk$set(dpi=300)
```

```{r echo= F}

d= fread(snakemake@input[[1]], h=F)
colnames(d)= c('Sub-cohort', 'Median', 'P25', 'P75')
d$Median= paste0(d$Median, ' (', d$P25, ', ', d$P75, ')')
d= d[,c('Sub-cohort', 'Median')]
kable(d, align= c('l', 'c'), row.names= T, caption = "S1 Table: Total parental identical-by-descent sharing, in cM.", booktabs = T) %>% kable_styling(latex_options= c('striped', 'scale_down')) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T, color = "black", background = "white") %>% footnote(general_title= '', general= c('cM, centiMorgans', 'Germline was used to identify identical-by-descent segments with a minimum detection of 2 cM.'))

```
